mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Crosman, George H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col HW Crothers Wheeling Nov 29 1861. By Telegraph from Philada 29 1861. How many men in the battery Let me know by telegraph that the supplies may be sent GH Crosman Depty QM Genl 17G49pd [page 2] 140 artillery jackets pantaloons boots overcoats SP Talmas gloves 50 artillery blankets
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crosman, George H.
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Crothers, H. W.
